data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Chun-Tian, Shima, Hiroshi, Liang, Hou-Can, Li, He-Nan (2019): Four new species of Estheria Robineau-Desvoidy (Diptera: Tachinidae) from China and Nepal, with a review of the East Palearctic and Oriental species. Zootaxa 4603 (1): 1-38, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4603.1.1|281 occurrences
